snippet: The uncertainty appeared to stall major stock indexes, which moved between small gains and losses through much of the day.
abstract: Uncertainty over developments in Ukraine appears to stall major stock indexes, which moved between small gains and losses.
lead_paragraph: The uncertainty appeared to stall major stock indexes, which moved between small gains and losses through much of the day.

headline.main: Shares End Lower Ahead of Crimea Vote
headline.print_headline: Shares End Lower Ahead of Crimea Vote
